titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of Alabama Crimson Tide for winning the 2012 Bowl Championship Series National Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/28/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the University of Alabama Crimson Tide football team for winning the 2012 Bowl Championship Series National Championship.
